verses.name: Luke 17:12
verses.text: And as he entered into a certain village, there met him ten men that were lepers, which stood afar off:

verses.name: Luke 17:13
verses.text: And they lifted up their voices, and said, Jesus, Master, have mercy on us.

verses.name: Luke 17:14
verses.text: And when he saw them, he said unto them, Go shew yourselves unto the priests. And it came to pass, that, as they went, they were cleansed.

verses.name: Luke 17:15
verses.text: And one of them, when he saw that he was healed, turned back, and with a loud voice glorified God,

verses.name: Luke 17:16
verses.text: And fell down on his face at his feet, giving him thanks: and he was a Samaritan.
